description: Creates an assessment in Audit Manager.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the assessment to be created.

parameters.name: assessmentReportsDestination
parameters.description: The assessment report storage destination for the assessment that's being created. destinationType (string) --- The destination type, such as Amazon S3. destination (string) --- The destination bucket where Audit Manager stores assessment reports.

nested_params.name: destinationType
nested_params.description: The destination type, such as Amazon S3.

nested_params.name: destination
nested_params.description: The destination bucket where Audit Manager stores assessment reports.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The wrapper that contains the Amazon Web Services accounts that are in scope for the assessment. awsAccounts (list) --- The Amazon Web Services accounts that are included in the scope of the assessment. (dict) --- The wrapper of Amazon Web Services account details, such as account ID or email address. id (string) --- The identifier for the Amazon Web Services account. emailAddress (string) --- The email address that's associated with the Amazon Web Services account. name (string) --- The name of the Amazon Web Services account. awsServices (list) --- The Amazon Web Services services that are included in the scope of the assessment. (dict) --- An Amazon Web Service such as Amazon S3 or CloudTrail. For an example of how to find an Amazon Web Service name and how to define it in your assessment scope, see the following: Finding an Amazon Web Service name to use in your assessment scope Defining an Amazon Web Service name in your assessment scope serviceName (string) --- The name of the Amazon Web Service.

nested_params.name: awsAccounts
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services accounts that are included in the scope of the assessment.

nested_params.name: id
nested_params.description: The identifier for the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_params.name: emailAddress
nested_params.description: The email address that's associated with the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_params.name: name
nested_params.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_params.name: awsServices
nested_params.description: The Amazon Web Services services that are included in the scope of the assessment.

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: The list of roles for the assessment. (dict) --- The wrapper that contains the Audit Manager role information of the current user. This includes the role type and IAM Amazon Resource Name (ARN). The type of customer persona. The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

parameters.name: frameworkId
parameters.description: The identifier for the framework that the assessment will be created from.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags that are associated with the assessment. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: assessment
nested_items.description: An entity that defines the scope of audit evidence collected by Audit Manager. An Audit Manager assessment is an implementation of an Audit Manager framework.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the assessment.

nested_items.name: awsAccount
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services account that's associated with the assessment.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: emailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address that's associated with the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the assessment.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the assessment.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the assessment.

nested_items.name: complianceType
nested_items.description: The name of the compliance standard that's related to the assessment, such as PCI-DSS.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The overall status of the assessment.

nested_items.name: assessmentReportsDestination
nested_items.description: The destination that evidence reports are stored in for the assessment.

nested_items.name: destinationType
nested_items.description: The destination type, such as Amazon S3.

nested_items.name: destination
nested_items.description: The destination bucket where Audit Manager stores assessment reports.

nested_items.name: awsAccounts
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services accounts that are included in the scope of the assessment.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: emailAddress
nested_items.description: The email address that's associated with the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: awsServices
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services services that are included in the scope of the assessment.
Finding an Amazon Web Service name to use in your assessment scope.
Defining an Amazon Web Service name in your assessment scope.

nested_items.name: roles
nested_items.description: The roles that are associated with the assessment.

nested_items.name: roleType
nested_items.description: The type of customer persona.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: delegations
nested_items.description: The delegations that are associated with the assessment.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the delegation.

nested_items.name: assessmentName
nested_items.description: The name of the assessment that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: assessmentId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the assessment that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the delegation.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: roleType
nested_items.description: The type of customer persona.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the delegation was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: Specifies when the delegation was last updated.

nested_items.name: controlSetId
nested_items.description: The identifier for the control set that's associated with the delegation.

nested_items.name: comment
nested_items.description: The comment that's related to the delegation.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user or role that created the delegation.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Specifies when the assessment was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdated
nested_items.description: The time of the most recent update.

nested_items.name: framework
nested_items.description: The framework that the assessment was created from.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the framework.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the framework.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the framework.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the framework.

nested_items.name: logo
nested_items.description: The logo that's associated with the framework.

nested_items.name: complianceType
nested_items.description: The compliance standard that's associated with the framework. For example, this could be PCI DSS or HIPAA.

nested_items.name: controlSets
nested_items.description: The control sets that are associated with the framework.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the control set in the assessment. This is the control set name in a plain string format.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description for the control set.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the control set.

nested_items.name: roles
nested_items.description: The roles that are associated with the control set.

nested_items.name: roleType
nested_items.description: The type of customer persona.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the IAM role.

nested_items.name: controls
nested_items.description: The list of controls that's contained with the control set.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the control.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the control.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the control.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the control.

nested_items.name: response
nested_items.description: The response of the control.

nested_items.name: comments
nested_items.description: The list of comments that's attached to the control.

nested_items.name: authorName
nested_items.description: The name of the user who authored the comment.

nested_items.name: commentBody
nested_items.description: The body text of a control comment.

nested_items.name: postedDate
nested_items.description: The time when the comment was posted.

nested_items.name: evidenceSources
nested_items.description: The list of data sources for the evidence.
(string) ---

nested_items.description: The amount of evidence that's collected for the control.

nested_items.description: The amount of evidence in the assessment report.
